problemPool.title: Incomplete 5W1H context
problemPool.description: The source is known, but Who/When/Why are not documented.
options: Complete the source sheet with Who, What, Where, When, Why, How

problemPool.title: Heterogeneous sources
problemPool.description: Surveys, sensors, and social networks arrive at different rhythms.
options: Define a source-by-source collection plan with a shared timestamp

problemPool.title: Missing required fields
problemPool.description: Records arrive without a source identifier.
options: Validate required fields at input and reject invalid rows

phases.label: Data Extraction
phases.shortDescription: Extraction through dumps, queries, streams, and APIs.

problemPool.title: Oversized dump
problemPool.description: The full dump blocks processing and memory.
options: Switch to selective and incremental extraction

problemPool.title: Incorrect query filter
problemPool.description: SQL/SPARQL parameters extract rows outside scope.
options: Fix filtering criteria and test on a sample

problemPool.title: Fragile API integration
problemPool.description: The API format changes and the internal wrapper breaks.
options: Version the wrapper and add response validation

phases.label: Data Cleaning
phases.shortDescription: Fix syntax, semantic, and coverage errors.

problemPool.title: Syntax errors
problemPool.description: Some numeric values are entered as text (e.g., ten).
options: Apply type validation rules and correct entries
Convert the whole column to text

problemPool.title: Semantic contradictions
problemPool.description: A product is marked both in stock and out of stock at the same time.
options: Define an integrity rule and resolve contradictions

problemPool.title: Coverage errors
problemPool.description: Values and records are missing in the database.
options: Handle missing values and complete with reliable sources
Fill all missing values with zero

problemPool.title: Schema validation failed
problemPool.description: JSON/XML does not comply with the expected schema.
options: Validate against the schema and fix structure before loading
Load even if the schema is invalid

problemPool.title: Irregular units
problemPool.description: The same measure appears in kg and pounds.
options: Standardize units with a documented transformation
Mix units in the same column

problemPool.title: Incomplete field mapping
problemPool.description: Several source columns are not mapped to target columns.
options: Finalize the mapping table and test end-to-end

phases.label: Data Storage
phases.shortDescription: Choose formats, models, and storage properties.

problemPool.title: Inadequate storage format
problemPool.description: A semi-structured stream is forced into a rigid tabular schema.
options: Choose the right format (JSON/XML/CSV) based on structure
Force all data into raw CSV

problemPool.title: Wrong database type
problemPool.description: The chosen relational model does not match document/graph needs.
options: Keep the current database no matter what

problemPool.title: Consistency conflict
problemPool.description: Concurrent transactions produce inconsistent states.
options: Strengthen ACID guarantees for critical operations

phases.label: Analysis Modeling
phases.shortDescription: Design facts, dimensions, and analytical models.

problemPool.title: Unclear fact table grain
problemPool.description: The detail level of measures is not defined.
options: Define the grain explicitly before model loading
Let each source decide the level of detail
Mix multiple grains in one table

problemPool.title: Inconsistent dimensions
problemPool.description: Time/product/customer dimensions do not use consistent keys.
options: Normalize dimension keys and document joins

problemPool.title: Overly complex snowflake
problemPool.description: Normalization reduces redundancy but heavily complicates queries.
options: Balance star vs snowflake based on performance and maintenance
Normalize all tables with no trade-off

phases.label: Data Analysis
phases.shortDescription: Filter, derive, sort, detect anomalies, and correlate.

problemPool.title: Biased filtering
problemPool.description: The current filter unintentionally excludes a major population.
options: Review filter criteria and compare before/after impact

problemPool.title: Undetected anomalies
problemPool.description: Outliers distort derived indicators.
options: Identify and handle anomalies before interpretation
Delete half of extreme values randomly

problemPool.title: Misinterpreted correlation
problemPool.description: A correlation is presented as causation.
options: Present correlation with context and limits

phases.label: Data Visualization
phases.shortDescription: Clear representation: series, distribution, correlation, comparison.

problemPool.title: Inappropriate chart type
problemPool.description: A pie chart is used for a time series.
options: Choose chart type based on objective (line, histogram, scatter, etc.)
Always use the same chart type

problemPool.title: Misleading scale
problemPool.description: A truncated axis exaggerates minor differences.
options: Use a readable scale and justify any truncation

problemPool.title: Poor visual variable mapping
problemPool.description: Color and size are not mapped to the right dimensions.
options: Map position/size/color according to variable meaning
Encode all variables with the same shape
